original_title: Iniciação dos Filhos dos Espíritos da Terra
overview: The boys of an Tikmu'un - Maxakali village are initiated by the spirits that live on the ground. From now on they will be able to attend the kuxex (house of religion), socialize, feed and learn from the Yãmiyxop.
title: Iniciação dos Filhos dos Espíritos da Terra
